name: Passport Piccanté - World Flavours Hot Sauce Gift Set
description:
Passport Piccanté is the ultimate selection box of Chilli sauce tasting tubes from around the world.
10 of the 12 sauces in this hot sauce gift set are Great Taste Award Winners – expect very high-quality delicious sauces ranging from mild to hot.
Pick up your very own passport to the world of spice! Containing twelve glass 15ml tubes of award-winning chilli sauces, made only with the best and most healthy ingredients, this gourmet hot sauce selection box will keep hot sauce lovers occupied at breakfast, lunch and dinner.
This hot sauce gift set brings any meal and any occasion to life.
Sold at Fortnum & Mason in Picadilly London.
category: Hot Sauce Gift Sets & Chilli Gifts
